definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: The previous record was held by an Indian man who delivered a 120-hour speech.
sentences.chinese: 此前的紀錄爲120小時，由一個印度人創造。

sentences.english: Winning his heat in a comfortable 14.02 seconds in front of 3500 people at Tseung Kwan O Sports Ground, Liu Xiang finally strode home with 13.66 seconds for the title.
sentences.chinese: 而在此前的預賽中，劉翔以14秒02輕鬆晉級。

sentences.english: Both countries increased their holdings during the preceding 12 months.
sentences.chinese: 在此前12個月內，兩國都增持了美國國債。

sentences.english: But previously he hadn't said anything like that.
sentences.chinese: 但是此前他並沒有說任何類似的話。

sentences.english: Analysts had forecast a 56-cent profit, according to a Bloomberg survey.
sentences.chinese: 據彭博社調查顯示，此前分析師預測利潤爲56美分。

sentences.english: He and his family had been living in a refugee camp in Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 他和家人此前一直生活在肯尼亞一個難民營中。

sentences.english: How long after surgery did Jenn start therapy, and how was her hand cared for up until that point?
sentences.chinese: 詹尼弗手術後多久開始理療，此前怎麼護理？

sentences.english: Around this time, he introduced some new techniques for dyeing cloth.
sentences.chinese: 在此前後，他引進一些用於染布的新技術。

sentences.english: This was also the case in an earlier PPA study involving appetite suppressants.
sentences.chinese: 此前對食慾抑制劑研究的結果與之相同。

sentences.english: On the economic front, China is paying the price for its rescue plan.
sentences.chinese: 在經濟戰線，中國正在爲此前的營救計劃付出代價。

sentences.english: Starsmay not be loners, as once thought.
sentences.chinese: 恆星可能並不像此前所認爲的那樣是一個“孤獨者”。

sentences.english: Because he sees it that way in the past.
sentences.chinese: 是因爲他此前曾從這個角度看過。

sentences.english: Reported smoke coming from the 3 after the reactor has stopped smoking.
sentences.chinese: 報道稱，此前冒出白煙的3號反應堆已經停止冒煙。

sentences.english: But this is telling us that it does and that the fade-out effect is misleading in some sense.
sentences.chinese: 此前的消退效應，在一定意義上是一種誤導。

sentences.english: A week earlier he was also in North Korea with a parliamentary delegation.
sentences.chinese: 此前一週，他還隨中國人大代表團到訪朝鮮。

sentences.english: Before that days, the small remote village had never had high school and kindergarten.
sentences.chinese: 此前，這個偏遠小山村還辦過初中和幼兒園。

definition: once/already/ever (in the past)/former/previously/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
foreign news media/abbr. of 外國媒體|外国媒体
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
it is said/allegedly/according to reports/or so they say
